title: FS: 1882 Forbes trade card with GAME TICKET printed on back - SGC authenticated!
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: FS: 1882 Forbes trade card with GAME TICKET printed on back - SGC authenticated!
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I am selling the pictured 1882 trade card from Forbes Co., entitled "Victory."  It has been graded authentic by SGC.

On its own, these trade cards aren't all that scarce, and sell at relatively low prices.  BUT, this one has been printed on the back with a game ticket for a game on Saturday, July 1, 1882, at Union Park, Pittsburgh, PA, between J.D. Bernd Co. and Porter & Donaldson.  (These apparently were two mining / steel companies.)

The card itself is in nice shape with no creases, though the four corners on the back show where it was removed from a scrapbook.

I am only aware of one other card like this which has been printed for use as a game ticket - it was the companion to this ticket, and sold in an H&S auction in 2011 for nearly $1,200 with the juice.  A link to that auction is here:
[url]http://jan11.hugginsandscott.com/cgi-bin/showitem.pl?itemid=29144[/url]

I am seeking $750 for this example.  Check / money order preferred at this time.

Thanks for looking!
Scott

Bump - any offers would be considered, including trades.

Thanks,
Scott
cool piece!  if I were a 19th c trade card type collector...i'd be all over it!
New Year's bump - I got a couple of offers on this before but it is still available, so seeing if there's any other interest....
